attributes.action: Offer more assistance for married mothers to return to work after bringing up the kids.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do mothers who stayed at home for years to look after their children whilst their husband worked find themselves trapped when they want to go back to work?  Many do not qualify for assistance from the job centre but cannot afford further education either. It's like we don't exist, the government helps almost every other member of society back into work - what about us??
